attributes.action: Ban the use of fireworks with elements of loud noises!
attributes.additional_details: Ban the sale and use of products ie fireworks that cause loud noises ie bangs that cause distress to ani and war veterans with PTSD.
attributes.background: Ban the sale of fireworks that create loud noises that cause distress to War Veterans and household pets!

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign some of these petitions:

Review and reduce the decibel limit on fireworks sold to the public: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/549758

Ban the use of all fireworks in order to reduce air and noise pollution: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/334448

While some fireworks are marketed as silent, these still make some noise. If you would like the Government to reduce the decibel limit to a specific level, you could start a new petition requesting this.
